alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McCurtain and northwestern Red River Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Octavia to near Sumner. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Idabel, Broken Bow, Bagwell, Manchester, Wright City, Valliant, Detroit, Millerton, Garvin, Rufe, Smithville, Hochatown, Watson, Battiest, Mount Herman, Woodland, Redland, Kanawha, Glover and Kiomatia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...southeastern Oklahoma...and northeastern Texas.
